house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1979 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, patio, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher,Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Library, Pantry,Skylights, Trash Compacter
